Frequency once per minute

Trigger You use @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Quick Alchemy]{Quick Alchemy} to craft an alchemical bomb that deals splash damage and is at least 2 levels lower than your @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.classfeatures.Advanced Alchemy]{Advanced Alchemy} level.

Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded. Any target hit by your Strike with the bomb is @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Fascinated]{Fascinated} by you for 1 round. On a critical success, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.
